document_data.name: Grimslaak
document_data.mainbody: '''Grimslaak''' was an [[ultroloth]] agent of [[Yrkhetep]] in [[Chondath]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1358 DR, Grimslaak killed and replaced the innkeeper of the [[Inn of the Five Crown]] in [[Arrabar]] in order to spy on the meeting  of the [[Sisterhood of the Oaks]], [[Company of the Singing Dawn|the Lightblades, the Sunshafts]], and the [[Windriders]], where they organized their battle plans against the troops of one of the Yrkhetep's minions. Eventually he sent three [[yagnoloth]]s to kill possible disturbers.
